parsed.explanation: The original XML was not well-formed due to several issues: (1) The XML string was not wrapped in a CDATA section or properly escaped, (2) there was a syntax error in the TITLE element (missing '='), (3) several Unicode characters were not properly represented, and (4) the XML string was directly embedded within JSON without being properly handled as XML content. The fixes included: wrapping the XML string in a CDATA section is not chosen, instead, the XML string is properly escaped; correcting the TITLE element syntax; representing Unicode characters correctly; and wrapping the 'xml_string' within a 'content' element to make the overall structure well-formed XML.
